*Infectra runs after Airbomber and Stranato*


*Blizzard and Twister stand =
there watching the three run away*

Blizzard: Yeah, we're with you.

*Twist=
er nods*

*Blizzard walks up to Sinister*

Blizzard: Are you okay?

*Twiste=
r walks up to Sinesis*

Twister: Are your damages bad?
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, J=
uly 26, 2000 7:45 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Deemos and Inzola walk u=
p to Lunarpine and Ramulus.

  "Hello?" Deemos asked, he was getting mad.

=
  Gangon's spark is almost DEAD, his spark was trying to join with the Matr=
ix.

  Plintissa gets up and Airbomber jumps next to her. Dracona fires an =
ice beam. Airbomber jumps out of the way and his arm is frozen as he pushes=
 Plintissa out of the way. Dracona laughs. But suddenly.

  Dracona: What t=
he?

  Dracona is grabbed and listed up, and gets the Dudley Death Drop fro=
m Stronghold and Blender. Blender does the Diamond Cutter sign.

  Blender:=
 Bang!

  "Nothing like a good beating, as long as your not the one recievi=
ng it." Stronghold said. Sinesis and Sinister fired beams that blasted Blen=
der and Stronghold from behind. They suddenly had trouble moving. Sinesis a=
nd Sinister stood up smiling.

  "Take a licking and keep on ticking!" Sini=
ster said. The device they were holding was a reprograming device. Strongho=
ld and Blender stared mindlessly. Stranato looked on in shock. Dracona stan=
ds up and slaps Blender. He wakes up. She slaps Stronghold and wakes him up=
. Blender turns and Train Wreck is running by. Blender trips him up! Train =
Wreck is kicked in the ribs by Dracona. Sinesis and Sinister fired at him w=
ith the reprogramming beam. Train Wreck stares, looking more evil than befo=
re. Arrow is grabbed and whipped by Stronghold, right into Blender's clothe=
line. Sinesis and Sinister fire the beam and hit Arrow as well. Arrow sudde=
nly turns on Airbomber, firing at him. Airbomber moves out of the way as a =
beam hits the spot. Suddenly, the device explodes and blows off Sinesis' ar=
m. Plintissa is holding a smoking blaster. Plintissa and Artist run as Sine=
sis fires furiously with his other arm. Plintissa and Artist escape. Airbom=
ber is helped up by Stranato.

  "Infectra, run!" Airbomber said. Stranato =
and Airbomber run, leaving their former Radicon teammates behind. Train Wre=
ck, Sinesis, Sinister, Arrow, Stronghold, and Blender stand next to their l=
eader, Dracona.

  "Our device was destroyed!" Sinister said.

  "No matter=
, we'll get those 5." Dracona said.

  Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.
=

  "Blizzard, Twister, you with us?" Dracona asked.

  Stranato and Airbomb=
er flee into the woods.

  Plintissa and Artist run over a hill.

  Dracona=
 contacts Zardus.

  "Zardus, this is anonymous bot looking for a good side=
, are you interested in a good team of 9 bots?" Dracona asks...

----------=
--------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
